item.title: Building Blockchain Security at Scale
item.description: After years building AI systems for healthcare and LLMs, I’ve found my most challenging and impactful work yet: blockchain security and compliance at Range.org. The Transition to Blockchain Moving from traditional ML to blockchain required learning entirely new paradigms: Healthcare AI: Structured data, regulated environments, batch processing Blockchain ML: Graph data, pseudonymous actors, real-time requirements The shift wasn’t just technical‚Äîit was philosophical. In blockchain, trust is code, and every system must be designed for adversarial environments.

item.title: Hugo Portfolio Website
item.description: I created my portfolio website using Hugo and UIKit, it serves as an online resume containing all my work. This has been created as a theme so that others can use and adapt it. Sections Homepage The homepage provides the basic information about you, including links to social media, skills you have, things you’ve done and your education. This page makes good use of UIKit grid and cards for organising all the information and ensuring it is responsive to work on mobile devices.
